Description: Youtou Yumewatari (妖刀 夢渡, lit., Demon Sword Dream Span) is a demon sword that heals oddities, bringing them back to life after "death". It is the opposite counterpart of Kokorowatari.

#Appearance.text: Much like its counterpart, Yumewatari is a long sword of seemingly excellent craftsmanship. It is roughly half the length of Kokorowatari.

#Background.text: Like its counterpart, it was owned by the original oddity slayer known as Seishirou Shishirui.
